author: Brittany Valadez For Dailymail.Com
title: Katherine Heigl shares family photo after cancelled show | Daily Mail Online
text: Share 'We may have a 2017 Family Christmas card winner here people!' In the adorable group selfie, Katherine, 38, and her family rested against a bed, with poses ranging from smiles, to yawns and an innocent hand-in-the-face. Cancelled? On Friday, EW reported that Katherine's legal drama Doubt, was cut from the CBS lineup after two episodes On Friday, EW reported that Katherine's legal drama Doubt, was cut from the CBS lineup after two episodes. It is not known if it will return. In the show, the Grey's Anatomy star played a lawyer who falls for her client. Despite 13 episodes ordered by the network, it's possible that ratings for the first two episodes-5.31 million followed by 4.03 million- played a big part in the show's pull from the schedule. Premise: In the show, the Grey's Anatomy star played a lawyer who falls for her client There is a silver lining for D.C. native. Katherine will star alongside Rosario Dawson and Cheryl Ladd in the thriller, Unforgettable, out in April. Then, the actress will join a collection of A-list talent including Bobby Cannavale, Jackie Chan, Will Arnett and Maya Rudolph in the animated comedy, The Nut Job 2: Nutty by Nature.
